patients.phenotype: similar to ATTRwt, presenting with cardiac amyloidosis

individual_records.phenotype_details: cardiac amyloidosis with heart failure symptoms
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The V122I mutation, found exclusively in individuals of Afro-Caribbean descent, has a phenotype similar to ATTRwt.

functional_data.summary: The V122I variant is associated with increased amyloidogenic potential.

variants.segregation_data: The V122I variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on clinical and functional studies.
variants.additional_notes: The V122I variant is a well-studied mutation associated with familial amyloid cardiomyopathy.
key_quotes: The V122I mutation, found exclusively in individuals of Afro-Caribbean descent, has a phenotype similar to ATTRwt.
